{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
d = {
    
    'Wayne Tuck Jr.' : {
        
         'href' : 'event.php?view=Team&eventid=6400&teamid=144353&profileid=12486#1'
        ,'hammer' : True
        ,'score' : ['0','2','0','0','0','0','1','1','1','0']
        ,'finalscore' : '5'
        
    }
    ,'Matthew Hall' : {
        
         'href' : 'event.php?view=Team&eventid=6400&teamid=144347&profileid=12435#1'
        ,'hammer' : False
        ,'score' : ['0','0','4','0','0','1','0','0','0','2']
        ,'finalscore' : '7'
    }
    
}

assert get_boxscore(

     cz_event_id = 6400
    ,cz_draw_id = 2
    ,game_number = 1

) == d

assert get_boxscore(

     cz_event_id = 70000
    ,cz_draw_id = 1
    ,game_number = 1

) == {}
